attributes.action: STOP LORRIES OVER TAKING DURING PEAK PERIODS ON MOTORWAYS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having seen this work in germany it almost irradicates tail backs caused by lorries over taking other lorries by 1 mph. Which in turn causes almost all tail back due to "the consitina effect".

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
